Attacks 1 enemy.

skills.desc:
[Passive Effect]

Places a [Block Damage] buff on this Champion for 1 turn at the start of each Round. 

[Active Effect]

Blocks incoming damage and places a [Block Damage] buff on this Champion for 1 turn when they receive a hit that would drop their HP below 30%.
